PHRASE.LANG: Played in casinos across the galaxy, the exciting dice game is now here for you to try. When you light up all the letters, don't forget to shout "OOBLAG!" [#Legal]
À vous de tester ce passionnant jeu de dés joué dans tous les casinos de la galaxie. En allumant toutes les lettres, n'oubliez pas de crier "OOBLAG !" [#Legal]
Played in casinos across the galaxy, the exciting dice game is now here for you to try. When you light up all the letters, don't forget to shout "OOBLAG!" [#Legal]
Played in casinos across the galaxy, the exciting dice game is now here for you to try. When you light up all the letters, don't forget to shout "OOBLAG!" [#Legal]

Unfortunately you have taken too long deciding your win/lose bet and have been asked to leave the table.

Feel free to join the table again if you still wish to play.

Malheureusement vous avez mis trop de temps à décider de votre mise gagnante/perdante, et on vous a demandé de quitter la table.

N'hésitez pas à vous joindre de nouveau à la table si vous souhaitez jouer encore.

Unfortunately you have taken too long deciding your win/lose bet and have been asked to leave the table.

Feel free to join the table again if you still wish to play.

Unfortunately you have taken too long deciding your win/lose bet and have been asked to leave the table.

Feel free to join the table again if you still wish to play.

How to win - Phase One.

Every Ooblag round is made up of two phases.
First phase begins after the Win/Lose bets.
If a 2, 3 or 12 is rolled during first phase then the board loses.
Bets paid out on Lose and a new round begins.
If a 7 or 11 is rolled during first phase then the board wins.
Bets paid out on Win and a new round begins.
All other numbers are considered the point and a marker is placed above corresponding number.
This begins phase two.

Comment gagner - Phase Un.

Chaque tour d'Ooblag se compose de deux phases.
La première phase commence après les mises gagnantes/perdantes.
Si vous obtenez 2,3 ou 12 lors de la première phase, alors le plateau perd.
Les mises sont payées sur Lose (Perte) et un nouveau tour commence.
Tous les autres chiffres sont attribués au point et un repère apparaît au-dessus du chiffre correspondant.
Cela marque le début de la seconde phase.

How to win - Phase One.

Every Ooblag round is made up of two phases.
First phase begins after the Win/Lose bets.
If a 2, 3 or 12 is rolled during first phase then the board loses.
Bets paid out on Lose and a new round begins.
If a 7 or 11 is rolled during first phase then the board wins.
Bets paid out on Win and a new round begins.
All other numbers are considered the point and a marker is placed above corresponding number.
This begins phase two.

How to win - Phase One.

Every Ooblag round is made up of two phases.
First phase begins after the Win/Lose bets.
If a 2, 3 or 12 is rolled during first phase then the board loses.
Bets paid out on Lose and a new round begins.
If a 7 or 11 is rolled during first phase then the board wins.
Bets paid out on Win and a new round begins.
All other numbers are considered the point and a marker is placed above corresponding number.
This begins phase two.

How to win - Phase Two.

The dice thrower will continue to roll the dice until either the point number is rolled again or a 7 is thrown.
If a 7 is thrown then the board loses and bets on Lose are paid out.
If the point number is thrown then the board wins and bets on Win are paid out.
A new round will then begin.

Comment gagner - Phase Deux.

Le lanceur de dés continue à les lancer jusqu'à obtenir le chiffre du point ou un 7.
Si un 7 est obtenu, alors le plateau perd et les mises placées sur Lose (Perte) sont payées.
Si le chiffre du point est obtenu, alors le plateau gagne et les mises placées sur Gain sont payées.
Un nouveau tour peut alors commencer.

How to win - Phase Two.

The dice thrower will continue to roll the dice until either the point number is rolled again or a 7 is thrown.
If a 7 is thrown then the board loses and bets on Lose are paid out.
If the point number is thrown then the board wins and bets on Win are paid out.
A new round will then begin.

How to win - Phase Two.

The dice thrower will continue to roll the dice until either the point number is rolled again or a 7 is thrown.
If a 7 is thrown then the board loses and bets on Lose are paid out.
If the point number is thrown then the board wins and bets on Win are paid out.
A new round will then begin.

How to bet and play.

Begin by selecting a bet on Win or Lose using [LEFT][RIGHT].
Adjust stake using [R2] and [L2]. Place bet using [ACCEPT].

Once Win/Lose bet is placed, choose whether to bet on other numbers.
Top line numbers indicate dice total.
Others represent individual dice values.
Any Pair, 2, 3, 11, 12 and corresponding values are considered one shot bets.
These bets are taken after each roll regardless if they win or lose.
Other bets remain until their corresponding value is thrown or the round ends.

Comment miser et jouer.
Commencez par placer une mise sur Win (Gain) ou Lose (Perte) en utilisant [LEFT][RIGHT].
Ajustez l'enjeu en utilisant [R2] et [L2]. Placez la mise à l'aide de [ACCEPT].

Une fois la mise gagnante/perdante placée, choisissez de miser sur d'autres chiffres ou non.
Les chiffres de la ligne supérieure indiquent le total des dés.
Les autres représentent les valeurs de dés individuelles.
Any Pair (Chanque paire), 2, 3, 11, 12 et les valeurs correspondantes sont considérées comme des mises uniques.
Ces mises sont ramassées après chaque lancé, qu'il soit gagnant ou perdant.
Les autres mises restent jusqu'à ce que la valeur correspondante soit obtenue au lancé ou jusqu'à la fin du tour.

Others represent individual dice values.
Any Pair, 2, 3, 11, 12 and corresponding values are considered one shot bets.
These bets are taken after each roll regardless if they win or lose.
Other bets remain until their corresponding value is thrown or the round ends.

Shake wireless controller to roll dice
Secouer la manette pour lancer les dés
Shake wireless controller to roll dice
Shake wireless controller to roll dice

To get started, just pick either Win or Lose by pressing the [ACCEPT] button. You can then place other bets on the main board.\nThe dice roller can roll the dice, once the prompt has appeared, by shaking the controller.
Pour commencer, il suffit de sélectionner Win (Gain) ou Lose (Perte) avec la touche [ACCEPT].\n Lancer les dés en secouant la manette DUALSHOCK®3 wireless controller.

To get started, just pick either Win or Lose by pressing the [ACCEPT] button. You can then place other bets on the main board.\nThe dice roller can roll the dice, once the prompt has appeared, by shaking the controller.

To get started, just pick either Win or Lose by pressing the [ACCEPT] button. You can then place other bets on the main board.\nThe dice roller can roll the dice, once the prompt has appeared, by shaking the controller.
If the numbers 2, 3 or 12 are thrown on the first roll, then the round 'Loses' and all correct bets are paid out.\nA new dice thrower is then selected and a new round begins.
Si vous obtenez 2, 3 ou 12 dès le premier lancé, le premier tour est "Perdu" et tous les paris corrects sont encaissés.\n Le joueur suivant est sélectioné et un nouveau tour commence.
If the numbers 2, 3 or 12 are thrown on the first roll, then the round 'Loses' and all correct bets are paid out.\nA new dice thrower is then selected and a new round begins.
If the numbers 2, 3 or 12 are thrown on the first roll, then the round 'Loses' and all correct bets are paid out.\nA new dice thrower is then selected and a new round begins.
If the numbers 7 or 11 are thrown on the first roll, then the round 'Wins' and all correct bets are paid out.\nA new dice thrower is then selected and a new round begins.
Si vous obtenez les numéros 7 ou 11 dès le premier lancé, le tour est "Gagné" et tous les paris corrects sont encaissés.
If the numbers 7 or 11 are thrown on the first roll, then the round 'Wins' and all correct bets are paid out.\nA new dice thrower is then selected and a new round begins.
If the numbers 7 or 11 are thrown on the first roll, then the round 'Wins' and all correct bets are paid out.\nA new dice thrower is then selected and a new round begins.

The remaining numbers 4, 5, 6, 8, 9 and 10 are called 'Pointers'.\nIf one of these numbers are thrown on the first throw then this establishes the 'Point Number' and the second phase of Ooblag begins.
Les chiffres 4, 5, 6, 8, 9 and 10 sont appelés "Pointeurs". Si vous obtenez l'un de ces chiffres, cela établit le "Chiffre point" et la deuxième phase du Ooblag commence.

The remaining numbers 4, 5, 6, 8, 9 and 10 are called 'Pointers'.\nIf one of these numbers are thrown on the first throw then this establishes the 'Point Number' and the second phase of Ooblag begins.

The remaining numbers 4, 5, 6, 8, 9 and 10 are called 'Pointers'.\nIf one of these numbers are thrown on the first throw then this establishes the 'Point Number' and the second phase of Ooblag begins.

Once a point number is established a marker is placed above it. In the above image the number 4 has been established as the 'Point'.\nThe aim now is for the thrower to roll the 'Point' number again before a 7 is thrown. If a 7 is thrown before the 'Point' number then the board 'Loses'. The board 'Wins' if the 'Point' is thrown.

Lorsqu'un "Chiffre Point" est établi, un repère apparaît. Dans l'image çi-dessus, le "Chiffre point" est 4.\nLe but du jeu est d'obtenir le "Chiffre Point" avant que le chiffre 7 ne sorte. Si vous obtenez un 7 avant le "Chiffre Point", tous les paris sont "Perdu". Les paris sont gagné lorsque le "Chiffre Point" sort avant le chiffre 7.

Once a point number is established a marker is placed above it. In the above image the number 4 has been established as the 'Point'.\nThe aim now is for the thrower to roll the 'Point' number again before a 7 is thrown. If a 7 is thrown before the 'Point' number then the board 'Loses'. The board 'Wins' if the 'Point' is thrown.

Once a point number is established a marker is placed above it. In the above image the number 4 has been established as the 'Point'.\nThe aim now is for the thrower to roll the 'Point' number again before a 7 is thrown. If a 7 is thrown before the 'Point' number then the board 'Loses'. The board 'Wins' if the 'Point' is thrown.

In between each roll of the dice, players can bet on the outcome of the next throw. All bets will remain in play until the end of the round, unless they are placed on a single shot bet. These single shot bets, along with their combinations, are 2, 3, 11, 12 and both Any Pairs.

Entre chaque lancé de dés, les joueurs peuvent parier sur le résultat du lancé. A moins que le paris soit une mise unique, tous les paris restent en jeux jusqu'à la fin du tour. Les mises uniques sont: toutes les 'Any Pair' (paires ainsi) que les chiffres 2, 3, 11, 12 et les valeurs correspondant.

In between each roll of the dice, players can bet on the outcome of the next throw. All bets will remain in play until the end of the round, unless they are placed on a single shot bet. These single shot bets, along with their combinations, are 2, 3, 11, 12 and both Any Pairs.

In between each roll of the dice, players can bet on the outcome of the next throw. All bets will remain in play until the end of the round, unless they are placed on a single shot bet. These single shot bets, along with their combinations, are 2, 3, 11, 12 and both Any Pairs.
Any bets which may have won during each roll of dice will be highlighted green during the summary period.
Les paris gagnants apparaîtront en vert pendant le sommaire.
Any bets which may have won during each roll of dice will be highlighted green during the summary period.
Any bets which may have won during each roll of dice will be highlighted green during the summary period.
Any bets which may have lost will also be highlighted during the summary period. These however will appear red.
Les paris perdants apparaîtront en rouge pendant le sommaire.
Any bets which may have lost will also be highlighted during the summary period. These however will appear red.
Any bets which may have lost will also be highlighted during the summary period. These however will appear red.
You can also bet on either of the 'Any Pair' which will pay out if both the dice are equal.
Les joueurs peuvent également miser sur 'Any Pair' (Chanque paire), et gagner si les deux chiffres obtenus sont identiques.
You can also bet on either of the 'Any Pair' which will pay out if both the dice are equal.
You can also bet on either of the 'Any Pair' which will pay out if both the dice are equal.
For every consecutive time you correctly guess the outcome of the round on 'Win' or 'Lose', a letter in the word OOBLAG will light up.
Pour chaque gain consécutif obtenu par un joueur, une lettre du mot Ooblag s'allume.
For every consecutive time you correctly guess the outcome of the round on 'Win' or 'Lose', a letter in the word OOBLAG will light up.
For every consecutive time you correctly guess the outcome of the round on 'Win' or 'Lose', a letter in the word OOBLAG will light up.

If you manage to light up all the OOBLAG letters, any winnings during this time will be doubled, however, if you incorrectly bet on the outcome of the round, then all the letters will reset and you will lose the bonus.
Une fois que toutes les lettres sont allumées, les gains des joueurs sont doublés. Quand les joueurs perdent, les lettres s'éteignent.

If you manage to light up all the OOBLAG letters, any winnings during this time will be doubled, however, if you incorrectly bet on the outcome of the round, then all the letters will reset and you will lose the bonus.
